title: Drawing, "Architect's Own Studio, Wellfleet, MA", 1953–54
medium: Pen and ink with brush and black ink, color crayons on tracing paper
inscribed: In black ink, center, left: S. W. Elevation 3 + 1 (3+1 is circled)  #6 (6 is circled)/this (with two arrows, circled).  In black ink, lower left edge: N.E. Elevation (dot under end of word)  3 + 1 (circled) #6 (circled)
description: Two elevations and an isometric projection of a small building raised on piers, with sides decorated in triangular, vari-colored patter.  Measurements of certain details given.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Architect's Own Studio, Wellfleet, MA", 1953–54.
1953–54. Pen and ink with brush and black ink, color crayons on tracing paper. Gift of Serge Ivan Chermayeff. 1962-45-9.
